channel.title: Port forward help!
channel.description:
i have a question
when you set up no-ip account, do you use the ip address they provide you or do you use a different one?
when i port forward on my router, it ask for an ip address. what do i put there?
would norton anti virus stop this from working?
Please help! who ever helps will get 30$ usd.

item.title: Port forward help!
item.dc:creator: @mini_pk4life mini pk4life
item.description:
@mini_pk4life wrote:

go to /start menu/ click on run
then write /cmd/ when its come a black screen write/ipconfig/
its come youâ€™r ip
you need to pot in this IP!!

Read full topic
